Whether they are indoors or out in the fresh air – there is a lot to do. Highlights Discover Munich's Museums Classics and hidden gems: Exhibitions, opening hours, tips for families Sports & Fitness Information on sports, leisure and recreation in and around Munich Lakes near Munich Beautiful lakes and rivers outside and within the city Auer Dult Strolling, shopping, enjoying delicacies - that's what the Dult is famous for Events In Munich there are many events, exhibitions and concerts to explore Orchestras & Choirs Get tickets to world class concerts in Munich at an affordable price Strolling through the old town Places to fall in love with: A tour with great tips for visitors Munich Tours and sightseeing Let tour organisers show you Munich's most interesting sights Ad TimeRide: A heavenly trip through 7,000 years of Bavaria's history Carnival, Festivals & Nightlife Summer festivals in Munich See many of the festivals that take place every summer in Munich Party Tips for Students New semester, new parties? Here is where you find what you are looking for Amazing Munich roof terraces and rooftop bars A drink with a view of the city’s rooftops and skyline Munich for families Free activities in Munich you shouldn't miss Cinema, theatre, culture and more - completely free of charge! Ihr könnte Eure Einwilligung jederzeit mit Wirkung für die Zukunft widerrufen, am Einfachsten durch Anklicken des Abmeldelinks am Ende des entsprechenden E-Mail-Newsletters.
